Articles.Content:
Hey! Hows it going everyone!

I decided to start playing career mode but when I started I had no science. Does anyone know how to fix that problem? I have looked and looked and i can't figure out how to get science and even unlock the first thing.

Hope to hear back from the community!

micahman223

You start with the small 1-kerbal pod, the LV-T30 engine, and some small fuel tanks already unlocked. You can use those to build a small suborbital rocket that you can use to get your first points of science. Or, even easier, just launch a pod and have Jeb get out and collect surface samples from the launchpad and the dirt around KSC in addition to some EVA and crew reports.
Ok so i checked that out but i don't have any parts available to start off withÃ¢â‚¬Â¦ so basically no science or parts at all.

I just opened up the game and started a new career (in version .23) and I have the Mk1 command pod, the LV-T30 engine, the RT-10 solid fuel booster, the FL-T200 fuel tank, the Modular Girder Segment, the Mk16 parachute, and the Communotron 16 antenna all unlocked and available for use in the VAB.

Did you actually check what you have in the VAB before you went to the R&D building?

Yes i have checked what i have and there is nothing present in any section in the VAB. Idk if its because i have a mac (even though ksp is available for mac) or if its just a glitch i have but i looked clearly and there isn't anything available.
Micahman223, to show a picture you need to upload it to an image hosting site. Imgur, Photobucket, etc.

Ok will do AmpstermanÃ¢â‚¬Â¦.. could a Facebook pic work ?

Edited February 9, 2014 by micahman223

Ok will do AmpstermanÃ¢â‚¬Â¦.. could a Facebook pic work ?

Doubt it. Imgur is free and has the added benefit of being able to add whole albums to the forums.
this is what my screen looks like when go into the VAB in career mode initially when i start.
Well, that is definitely not normal. Try re-installing your game.
Try clicking on the parts in the R&D, it should "purchase" them.
Alright i will start checking out your suggestions
Ok it worked thanks all for helping me :D
